answers.answer: The erectile dysfunction could be from one of your meds. Is your hypertension and diabetes under control? It really is best to ask your Dr if you can take this other med along with your current meds. Don't be afraid to talk about this with your Dr. They hear everything. If you can not take this med your Dr may be able to recommend something else to help you.

question: am taking metformin and inderal 40 and  lexotamil.Now  I am getting sexual problem.I want to know if I can use PROVIRON to treat erectile dysfunction?thank in advance
title: patient--- hypertension-diabetic
